job_tasks.phrase: operating our Data Centers' Network using modern DevOps tools, automation and classic administration methods.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of managing and operating network infrastructure, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks related to system operation and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for hardware, network operating systems and services that we provide in a growing environment.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for the foundational components of the IT infrastructure, aligning with software engineering tasks of managing and maintaining systems.

job_tasks.phrase: work (remotely) on our production services as well as our high-performance machine-learning clusters in multiple sites.
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning machine-learning clusters, the context is operating and maintaining the network infrastructure that supports them, not developing or integrating ML models themselves. This is an integration aspect from a network perspective.

job_tasks.phrase: Configure, maintain and monitor the network environment using our automation stack
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of system administration and network management tasks, fitting within the broader scope of software engineering operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain, improve and extend our automation stack (Golang, Templating)
job_tasks.justification: This task involves managing and enhancing the tools and scripts used for automation, which is a key aspect of DevOps and MLOps, specifically related to infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the ongoing renewal and optimization of our sites according to our architectural plans
job_tasks.justification: This refers to site infrastructure development and optimization, which is a software engineering task related to system architecture and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Troubleshooting physical and logical networking issues on routers, switches and Linux hosts
job_tasks.justification: This is a core IT operations and network engineering task, falling under the maintenance and troubleshooting aspects of software/system engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Working with multiple hardware vendors and a world-class, high-performance environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes interaction with the physical and operational aspects of the infrastructure, which is part of system engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinate the work of remote hands in our Data Centers
job_tasks.justification: This involves managing operational tasks and personnel within the data center environment, a responsibility within system operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members on larger work
job_tasks.justification: This is a general collaboration task within a technical team, fitting under software development and integration.
This relates to the operational support and maintenance of the network infrastructure, a common task in system engineering roles.
This phrase, while metaphorical, suggests a goal of enabling communication or access through the network infrastructure, hinting at a business objective.

job_tasks.phrase: work in close partnership with your team, the wider DevOps team and the Engineering department
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams, a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: you will join a team of broadly skilled engineers who will be able to support and kick-start your projects.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative and supportive nature of the team, indicating a focus on teamwork and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members on larger work
job_tasks.justification: Directly states collaboration as a task.

job_tasks.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the diverse team environment, implying a need for strong collaboration and communication skills across different cultures.

job_tasks.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly emphasizes open communication, feedback, and collaboration as core values.

job_tasks.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights a commitment to continuous learning and professional development, a key aspect of adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
job_tasks.justification: Hack Fridays encourage initiative, creativity, and passion projects, aligning with innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on network engineering, data center operations, and infrastructure management. There are no tasks or responsibilities related to developing, integrating, or specializing in AI/ML models, generative AI, or traditional machine learning. The mention of 'high-performance machine-learning clusters' is in the context of the network infrastructure supporting them, not the AI/ML work itself. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer' as it involves core software engineering and operations tasks without any AI/ML specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities of a Network Engineer. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML tasks, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
